author: roberto.bayardo
content: Seems we still lack consensus on how to proceed with blob tx signing/hashing <@881905303011086387> .  The concern with 6493 is it pulls in a lot of CL signing complexity that may not be relevant for the CL (e.g. fork-id being part of the domain).   I will try to summarize the various concerns & options raised in the 4844 client sync in a doc later today.  cc: <@543900561460822016> who expressed some concerns (which he kindly added to the eth magician's discussion here: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/eip-6493-ssz-transaction-signature-scheme/13050/7?u=roberto-bayardo).
